content.rendered:
[vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1578554623576{margin-left: 40px !important;border-left-width: 20px !important;}”]

WANT TO CREATE MOMENTS WITH YOUR AUDIENCE?

We offer a great chance to do so!

Pulse Active has a proven track record of helping sponsors to generate positive returns on investments in our events. We have a strong portfolio of events aimed at varied target audiences. Get in touch and we’ll find the perfect fit to grow your brand’s reach.

8 BENEFITS OF WORKING WITH US

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Improved sales
  • Direct access to your target market
  • Lead generation
  • Increased visibility

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • New clients and customers
  • Enhanced perception
  • Strengthened relationships
  • Reach a specific community

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column]
We believe that creating a strong, high-quality dialogue between a brand and its potential customers is best achieved by moving away from traditional forms of advertising and experimenting with a different, more effective marketing channel 
CONTACT US
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column width=”1/3″]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1578554623576{margin-left: 40px !important;border-left-width: 20px !important;}”]

WE POWER BRANDS.

What do we offer?
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Event concept & management 
  • Brand activation 
  • Branding consultancy 
  • Digital loyalty platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Registration 
  • Destination marketing
  • Operation & production
  • Merchandise service 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_btn title=”Check more details ” style=”outline” link=”url:%2Fservices%2F||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column][vc_masonry_media_grid element_width=”2″ item=”mediaGrid_ScaleWithRotation” grid_id=”vc_gid:1609989512839-b990a99e-c4cc-8″ include=”1106,1112,1121,1118,1109,1110,1111,1115,1116,1117,1120,1107″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”270″ parallax_speed_bg=”2″ the1_padding=”padding-medium” css=”.vc_custom_1538582692469{margin-top: 50px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.9) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}” el_class=”dark_bg”][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”10/12″]

HCMC Marathon was one of the biggest running events in Vietnam. It's great to see that the event is getting better and better each year, and our positive impact was successfully speared out throughout the event.

Mr.Cheng Presentative of Taiwan Excellence
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small” the1_colorpicker=”#f7f7f7″][vc_column]

Previous

Brands
We worked with
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”437″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”431″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”425″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”436″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”430″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”424″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”435″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”429″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”423″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”434″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”428″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”422″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”433″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”427″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”421″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”432″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”426″ alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”420″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
